instructions: Put the dinner plate on the bottom center of the table cloth
Set the salad plate on the dinner plate
Place the napkin in the center of the salad plate
Place the wine glass on the top right corner of the table cloth
Place the water glass diaganolly down from the wine glass on the right side
Place the salad fork on the bottom left side of the table cloth with the prongs pointing upward
Place the dinner fork on the right of the salad fork with the prongs pointing upward
Place the dinner knife closely to the right side of the plate with the blade pointing upward
Place the soup spoon to the right of the dinner knife with the bowl placing upward
